query.sentence: SELECT PROCESS_INSTANCE AS INSTANCE FROM VW_JMPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE WHERE NROSOLICITUD = ? AND VW_JMPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND TIPO IN (SELECT TIPO_SOLICITUD FROM CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO WHERE NUMEROSOLICITUD = ? AND CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO.TZ_LOCK = 0)

select AUT_SOLICITUDES.NROSOLICITUD, AUT_PROCESO.OPERACION FROM AUT_SOLICITUDES INNER JOIN AUT_PROCESO ON AUT_SOLICITUDES.CODIGO_PROCESO = AUT_PROCESO.ID AND AUT_SOLICITUDES.ESTADO = 'A' AND AUT_SOLICITUDES.FECHACONDICION <= ? AND (AUT_PROCESO.GRUPO_EJECUCION = ? OR AUT_PROCESO.GRUPO_EJECUCION = -1) AND AUT_SOLICITUDES.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND AUT_PROCESO.TZ_LOCK = 0
select cv_transferencia.nrosolicitud, 8040 operacion from cv_transferencia where nrosolicitud != 0
select JTS_OID AS nrosolicitud, 5064 operacion from SALDOS WHERE C1734 = 'U' AND C1785 = 4 AND (select FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) >= C1627 AND C1604 != 0
select JTS_OID AS nrosolicitud, 5065 operacion from SALDOS WHERE C1734 = 'T' AND C1785 = 4 AND (select FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) >= C1627 AND C1604 != 0
select CODIGO_CONTRATO AS nrosolicitud, 8665 operacion from VW_COF_COBRO_CAJA_SEG

SELECT s.JTS_OID AS NROSOLICITUD, 6080 AS OPERACION FROM SALDOS s INNER JOIN PRODUCTOS p ON s.PRODUCTO = p.C6250 AND p.C6800 = 'GO' AND p.TZ_LOCK = 0 WHERE s.C1604 != 0 AND s.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND (select FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) >= s.C1628
SELECT cuil AS nroSolicitud, 83 AS OPERACION FROM CLI_MAESTRO_FALLECIDOS WHERE ESTADO = 'I' AND TIPO_MOV='A' AND TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT cuil AS nroSolicitud, 85 AS OPERACION FROM CLI_MAESTRO_FALLECIDOS WHERE ESTADO = 'I' AND TIPO_MOV='B' AND TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT NRO_REGISTRO as NROSOLICITUD, 2656 AS OPERACION FROM VW_DEBITOSAUTOMATICOS WHERE TIPO_ORDEN='SC'

SELECT s.JTS_OID AS NROSOLICITUD, 6081 AS OPERACION FROM SALDOS s INNER JOIN PRODUCTOS p ON s.PRODUCTO = p.C6250 AND p.C6800 = 'GO' AND p.TZ_LOCK = 0 WHERE s.C1604 != 0 AND s.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND s.C1627 <= dateadd(DAY,(SELECT DIAS_AVISO_VENCIMIENTO FROM TOPESPRODUCTO WHERE CODPRODUCTO = s.PRODUCTO AND MONEDA = s.MONEDA AND TZ_LOCK = 0),(select FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS)) AND (select FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) <= s.C1627
SELECT ID_LIQUIDACION AS NROSOLICITUD, 2667 AS OPERACION FROM VW_DEBITO_AUTOMATICO ORDER BY estado asc
SELECT NROSOLICITUD, 8203 AS OPERACION FROM CRE_PAGO_DOMICILIO WHERE ESTADO IN ('I','E') AND EN_DOMICILIO = 'I' AND TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT ID_DEBITO AS NROSOLICITUD, 2680 AS OPERACION FROM SNP_DEBITOS WITH (nolock) WHERE ESTADO = 'PP' AND FECHA_VTO <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS WITH (nolock)) AND TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT ID_LIQUIDACION AS NROSOLICITUD, 2072 AS OPERACION FROM VW_CON_MOVIMIENTOS_IMPUESTOS_ME
select SALDOS_JTS_OID AS nrosolicitud, 2096 operacion from VW_SELLOS_CH_SOBREGIRO_CC
SELECT ID_LIQUIDACION AS NROSOLICITUD, 3768 AS OPERACION FROM VW_CHEQUE_RECHAZO_DEPOSITARIA
select JTS_OID_SALDOS AS nrosolicitud, 2090 operacion from VW_CONV_COMISION_CV_REMUNERADA

SELECT N.ID_ORDEN NROSOLICITUD, 2681 AS OPERACION FROM SNP_MSG_ORDENES AS O WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN VW_SNP_MSG_ORDENES_NUMERADAS AS N WITH (nolock) ON N.CUIT_EO = O.CUIT_EO AND N.ID_ARCHIVO = O.ID_ARCHIVO AND N.NRO_ARCHIVO = O.NRO_ARCHIVO AND N.CORRELATIVO = O.CORRELATIVO WHERE O.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND O.TIPO_ORDEN = 'DEBENV' AND ((O.ESTADO = 'PR' AND O.CONTABILIZADA <> 'S') OR (O.ESTADO = 'RC' AND O.CONTABILIZADA <> 'R')) AND O.FECHA_COMPENSACION <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS WITH (nolock))

SELECT OP_NUMERO AS NROSOLICITUD, 2685 AS OPERACION FROM VTA_TRANSFERENCIAS WITH(nolock) WHERE OP_CLASE_TRANS = 'R' AND ESTADO = 'PP' AND TZ_LOCK = 0 AND OP_TIPO IN (SELECT ID_TIPO FROM VTA_TRANSFERENCIAS_TIPOS WHERE TIPO_PROCESO IN ('MI', 'SC', 'SU'))

SELECT OP_NUMERO AS NROSOLICITUD, 2686 AS OPERACION FROM VTA_TRANSFERENCIAS WITH(nolock) WHERE OP_CLASE_TRANS = 'R' AND ESTADO = 'PR' AND OP_TIPO IN (SELECT ID_TIPO FROM VTA_TRANSFERENCIAS_TIPOS WHERE TIPO_PROCESO IN ('MI', 'SC', 'SU')) AND (CONTABILIZADA <> 'S' OR CONTABILIZADA IS NULL) AND FECHA_PAGO <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND TZ_LOCK = 0

SELECT so.NUMEROSOLICITUD AS NROSOLICITUD, 6115 AS OPERACION FROM CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO so WHERE so.IDMETODOLOGIA IN (SELECT NUMEROSOLICITUD FROM CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO where tz_lock = 0 AND ESTADOSOLICITUD = '16') AND so.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND dateadd(DAY,(SELECT DIASINMOVILIZADA FROM CRE_PARAMETROS WHERE CODIGO = 165), so.FECHADESEMBOLSO) < (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND so.ESTADOSOLICITUD = '23'

SELECT NUMEROSOLICITUD as NROSOLICITUD, 6116 AS OPERACION FROM CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO WHERE FECHA_VENCIMIENTO_SOLICITUD <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND ESTADOSOLICITUD NOT IN (4,21,22,23,32) AND TZ_LOCK = 0 AND NUMEROSOLICITUD NOT IN (SELECT IDMETODOLOGIA FROM CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO WHERE TZ_LOCK = 0)
SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD AS nroSolicitud, 3460 AS operacion FROM CHE_SOLICITUD_CANJE_INTERNO WHERE ENVIO_NOTIFICACION = 'N' AND TZ_LOCK=0
SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD AS nroSolicitud, 3683 AS operacion FROM CHE_SOLICITUD_CANJE_INTERNO WHERE ESTADO = 'I' AND OPERATIVA = 'D' AND TZ_LOCK=0

SELECT v.ID_REG AS NROSOLICITUD, 2828 AS OPERACION FROM TJD_COBRO_COMISIONES t INNER JOIN vw_tjd_cobro_comisiones v ON v.ID_SOLICITUD=t.ID_SOLICITUD AND v.SALDO_JTS_OID=t.SALDO_JTS_OID INNER JOIN saldos s WITH(nolock) ON s.JTS_OID=t.SALDO_JTS_OID AND s.TZ_LOCK=0 AND S.C1651 <> '1' AND S.C1679 = '0' AND S.C1728 <> 'I' WHERE t.ESTADO='P' AND t.TZ_LOCK=0
SELECT CORRELATIVO AS nroSolicitud, 0081 AS operacion FROM CLI_INHABILITADOS_INAES WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 AND ESTADO_EJECUCION = 'I'

SELECT MICRLINE AS alfaSolicitud, 3453 AS operacion FROM CLE_CHEQUES_CLEARING_RECIBIDO WHERE TZ_LOCK = 0 AND FECHA = (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND CODIGO_CAUSAL_DEVOLUCION IN (SELECT CODIGO_DE_CAUSAL FROM CLE_TIPO_CAUSAL WHERE TIPO_RECHAZO = 3) AND ESTADO_DEVOLUCION IN (1)
SELECT MICRLINE AS alfaSolicitud, 3456 AS operacion FROM VW_CLE_CHEQUES_RECHAZADOS

SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD as NROSOLICITUD, 5988 AS OPERACION FROM CLE_CHEQUES_SALIENTE WHERE NRO_SOLICITUD > 0 AND ESTADO = 2 AND TZ_LOCK = 0 AND ACREDITADO = 0 AND DESTINO_CHEQUE IN (2) AND FECHA_ACREDITACION <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND FECHA_ENVIO_COMPENSACION IS NOT NULL AND NRO_SOLICITUD NOT IN (SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD FROM CHE_CHEQUES WHERE TZ_LOCK = 0)

SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD as NROSOLICITUD, 5992 AS OPERACION FROM CLE_CHEQUES_SALIENTE WHERE NRO_SOLICITUD > 0 AND ESTADO = 2 AND TZ_LOCK = 0 AND ACREDITADO = 0 AND DESTINO_CHEQUE IN (2) AND FECHA_ACREDITACION <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND FECHA_ENVIO_COMPENSACION IS NOT NULL AND NRO_SOLICITUD IN (SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD FROM CHE_CHEQUES WHERE TZ_LOCK = 0)

SELECT R.MICRLINE AS alfaSolicitud, 3457 AS operacion FROM CLE_CHEQUES_CLEARING_RECIBIDO AS R WITH (nolock) WHERE R.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND R.FECHA = (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND R.CODIGO_CAUSAL_DEVOLUCION <> 0 AND R.ESTADO_DEVOLUCION = 3 AND (R.CANJE_INTERNO <> 'S' OR R.CANJE_INTERNO IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLE_CHEQUES_RECIBIDOS_AUX AS A WITH (nolock) WHERE A.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND A.SERIE = R.NUMERO_SERIE AND A.NRO_CHEQUE = R.NUMERO_CHEQUE AND A.SUCURSAL_CHEQUE = R.SUCURSAL AND A.MONEDA = R.MONEDA AND A.CUENTA = R.CUENTA AND A.PRODUCTO = R.PRODUCTO AND A.OPERACION = R.OPERACION AND A.FECHA_CHEQUE = R.FECHA AND A.SUCURSAL_ASIENTO = R.ASIENTO_SUCURSAL)
SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD as NROSOLICITUD, 3330 AS OPERACION FROM DJ_SOLICITUD_AD_INTEG_JUZ WHERE ESTADO IN ('I')
SELECT NRO_SOLICITUD as NROSOLICITUD, 3335 AS OPERACION FROM DJ_SOL_ACT_INAC_CAUSAS WHERE ESTADO IN ('I')

SELECT C.JTS_OID_CV AS NROSOLICITUD, 7592 AS OPERACION FROM CRE_ADELANTOS_HABERES C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.FECHA <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS WITH(NOLOCK)) AND C.ESTADO = 'I' AND C.TZ_LOCK=0 GROUP BY C.JTS_OID_CV

SELECT U.JTS_CUENTA_COBRO AS NROSOLICITUD, 8716 AS OPERACION FROM TJC_SALDOS S WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TJC_MAESTRO_USUARIO U WITH(NOLOCK) ON S.ADMINISTRADORA = u.ADMINISTRADORA AND S.USUARIO = u.USUARIO INNER JOIN SALDOS SD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SD.JTS_OID = U.JTS_SALDO_TARJETA AND SD.C8673 = S.PERIODO_DEUDA INNER JOIN SALDOS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.JTS_OID = U.JTS_CUENTA_COBRO WHERE s.FECHA_VTO <= (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS WITH(NOLOCK)) AND S.IMPORTE_DEBITO > 0 AND U.JTS_CUENTA_COBRO > 0 AND CV.MONEDA = 1 AND U.JTS_CUENTA_COBRO NOT IN (SELECT grl.SALDO_JTS_OID FROM GRL_BLOQUEOS grl WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN GRL_COD_BLOQUEOS cod WITH(NOLOCK) ON grl.COD_BLOQUEO=cod.COD_BLOQUEO WHERE grl.ESTADO=1 AND (grl.FECHA_VIGENCIA <= (SELECT fechaproceso FROM PARAMETROS WITH(NOLOCK)) AND (grl.FECHA_VENCIMIENTO >= (SELECT fechaproceso FROM PARAMETROS WITH(NOLOCK)) OR grl.MANEJA_VENCIMIENTO = 0)) AND ((cod.ACCIONES_DEBITO=3 AND isnull(cod.EXCEPCIONES,0)=0) OR (cod.ACCIONES_DEBITO=3 AND isnull(cod.EXCEPCIONES,0)=1 AND cod.COD_BLOQUEO NOT IN (SELECT ex.COD_BLOQUEO FROM GRL_BLOQUEOS_EXCEPCION ex WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ex.CODIGO_TRANSACCION IN (SELECT CODIGO_TRANSACCION FROM CODIGO_TRANSACCIONES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CODIGO_OPERACION=8716)))) ) GROUP BY U.JTS_CUENTA_COBRO

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.FECHA,112) + right(replicate('0',5) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.SUCURSAL),5) + right(replicate('0',10)+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ASIENTO),10) + right(replicate('0',6)+CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ORDINAL),6) + TIPO_TRAZA + 'BP'AS alfaSolicitud, 8912 AS OPERACION FROM BITACORA_PERSONAS_FISICAS A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.ESTADOREG = 'I' AND A.TZ_LOCK = 0 UNION ALLÂ SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.FECHA,112) + right(replicate('0',5) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.SUCURSAL),5) + right(replicate('0',10)+CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.ASIENTO),10) + right(replicate('0',6)+CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.ORDINAL),6) + TIPO_TRAZA + 'BD' AS alfaSolicitud, 8912 AS OPERACION FROM BITACORA_DOCUMENTOSPFPJ B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B.ESTADOREG = 'I' AND TIPOPERSONA = 'F' AND B.TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT NRO_REGISTRO as NROSOLICITUD,2825 AS OPERACION FROM TJD_LINK_MAESTRO WHERE PROCESADO='N'
SELECT NRO_REGISTRO as NROSOLICITUD,2826 AS OPERACION FROM TJD_LINK_MAESTRO_CUENTA WHERE PROCESADO='N'
SELECT 1 AS NROSOLICITUD, 2099 AS OPERACION
SELECT 1 AS NROSOLICITUD, 3260 AS OPERACION
SELECT 1 AS NROSOLICITUD, 3261 AS OPERACION
SELECT tdc.NROSOLICITUD AS nrosolicitud, 7933 AS OPERACION FROM TEMP_DJ_CUENTAS tdc

WITH TLF_CONC_EXTORNAR_MOVS AS ( -- CONSULTA MOVIMIENTOS QUE DEBIERON SER REVERSADOS SELECT d.JTS_OID_TP FROM TLF_CONCILIACION_DETALLE d INNER JOIN TLF_CONCILIACION_CABECERA c ON c.ID_CABECERA = d.ID_CABECERA WHERE c.ESTADO_CONCILIACION = 'NO_OK' and c.ESTADO_TLF = 'REVERSADA' and c.IMPACTOS_ONLINE > c.REVERSAS_ONLINE and c.FECHA_PROCESO = (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) UNION ALL -- CONSULTA MOVIMIENTOS DUPLICADOS A EXTORNAR SELECT d.JTS_OID_TP FROM TLF_CONCILIACION_DETALLE d INNER JOIN TLF_CONCILIACION_CABECERA c ON c.ID_CABECERA = d.ID_CABECERA WHERE c.ESTADO_CONCILIACION = 'NO_OK' AND c.ESTADO_TLF = 'APROBADA' AND c.IMPACTOS_ONLINE > 1 and c.FECHA_PROCESO = (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) AND d.ID_DETALLE NOT IN ( SELECT MAX(d2.ID_DETALLE) FROM TLF_CONCILIACION_DETALLE d2 INNER JOIN TLF_CONCILIACION_CABECERA c2 ON c2.ID_CABECERA = d2.ID_CABECERA WHERE c.ID_CABECERA = c2.ID_CABECERA) UNION ALL -- EXTORNOS DE MOVIMIENTOS RECHAZADOS POR LINK SELECT d.JTS_OID_TP FROM TLF_CONCILIACION_DETALLE d INNER JOIN TLF_CONCILIACION_CABECERA c ON c.ID_CABECERA = d.ID_CABECERA WHERE c.ESTADO_TLF='RECHAZADA' and c.ESTADO_CONCILIACION='NO_OK' and c.IMPACTOS_ONLINE > c.REVERSAS_ONLINE and c.FECHA_PROCESO = (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) ) SELECT JTS_OID_TP AS NROSOLICITUD, 7650 AS OPERACION FROM TLF_CONC_EXTORNAR_MOVS
SELECT Id_Registro AS NROSOLICITUD, 4602 AS OPERACION FROM MA_BANDEJA_ENTRADA WHERE Estado='I' AND (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) = ? AND NRO_LOTE = ? ORDER BY Accion

SELECT JTS_OID_CUENTA AS NROSOLICITUD, 8718 AS OPERACION FROM VTA_PENDIENTES_POS P WHERE P.JTS_OID_CUENTA NOT IN (SELECT GB.SALDO_JTS_OID FROM GRL_BLOQUEOS GB WHERE GB.ESTADO=1 AND GB.COD_BLOQUEO IN (SELECT CB.COD_BLOQUEO FROM GRL_COD_BLOQUEOS CB WHERE CB.ACCIONES_CREDITO=3)) AND P.ESTADO='I' AND P.TZ_LOCK=0

SELECT SALDO_JTS_OID AS NROSOLICITUD, 8717 AS OPERACION FROM VTA_RESERVAS R WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SALDOS S WITH(NOLOCK) ON S.JTS_OID=R.SALDO_JTS_OID WHERE R.IMPORTE_ORIGEN <=(S.C1604 + S.C1683 + S.C1605 + (S.C2627+R.IMPORTE_ORIGEN) + S.C50107) AND TIPO_RESERVA=4 AND ESTADO=1 AND R.TZ_LOCK=0 AND S.TZ_LOCK=0 GROUP BY SALDO_JTS_OID
SELECT NROSOLICITUD AS ALFASOLICITUD, 3404 AS OPERACION FROM VW_RECHAZO_SOL_CANJE_INT

SELECT ID_CHEQUE AS nroSolicitud, 3695 AS operacion FROM CLE_DEPOSITOS_ECHEQ WHERE ESTADO = 'A' AND TIPO_REG IN ('D') AND TZ_LOCK = 0 AND CMC7 NOT IN ( SELECT CMC7 FROM CLE_CHEQUES_SALIENTE WHERE DESTINO_CHEQUE = 3 AND ((TZ_LOCK < 100000000000000 OR TZ_LOCK >= 200000000000000) AND (TZ_LOCK < 300000000000000 OR TZ_LOCK >= 400000000000000) ) )
SELECT ID_CHEQUE AS nroSolicitud, 3699 AS operacion FROM CLE_DEPOSITOS_ECHEQ_TERCEROS WHERE ESTADO = 'A' AND TIPO_REG IN ('D','N') AND TZ_LOCK = 0
SELECT tjc.SUCURSAL AS NROSOLICITUD, 2858 AS OPERACION FROM TJC_SALDOS_SUCURSAL tjc
SELECT FECHAPROCESO AS alfaSolicitud, 3120 AS OPERACION FROM PARAMETROS

SELECT VW_CHE_CHEQUES_PROCESO.IDENTIFICADOR AS NROSOLICITUD, 3461 AS OPERACION FROM VW_CHE_CHEQUES_PROCESO WHERE VW_CHE_CHEQUES_PROCESO.estado = 'A' AND VW_CHE_CHEQUES_PROCESO.serie = 'E' AND DATEADD(DAY, 31, VW_CHE_CHEQUES_PROCESO.FECHA_VENCIMIENTO) < (select fechaproceso from parametros)

SELECT TOP 1 L.ID AS "NROSOLICITUD", 187 AS "OPERACION" FROM ITF_DJP_ACPRIV_LOTE L WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (SELECT FECHAPROCESO FROM PARAMETROS) = ? AND L.BANDEJA_LOTE_ID = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM MA_BANDEJA_ENTRADA E WHERE E.Origen = 'CP' AND E.Nro_Lote = L.BANDEJA_LOTE_ID ) ORDER BY (CASE WHEN L.ESTADO = 'I' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) ASC, L.ID
